Activity: Log in, check emails, and celebrate Friday! Last push for the week.
Conduct final testing of all UI elements and systems. Ensure everything is working correctly and looks polished.
Fix any remaining bugs or issues. Prioritize critical issues and address them first.
Optimize the UI for performance. Ensure it's not impacting the game's frame rate or responsiveness.
Create a build of the game with the latest UI changes. Share it with the team for review and feedback.
Lunch break. Celebrate Friday with a team lunch!
Address any feedback from the team. Make any necessary adjustments to the UI.
Document the UI system and its components. Create a user guide for other developers.
Back up all UI assets and code. Ensure everything is properly stored and versioned.
Prepare a summary of the week's accomplishments and challenges. Share it with the team.
Reflect on the week's work and identify areas for improvement in the future.
Log off and enjoy the weekend!
